title: Scholarship Donation
description: 100% of donations from our Give Butter platform go directly to the scholarship pool for that year. Scholarships have a limit of $500 per student. Any excess is added to form the next scholarship.

title: General Donation
description: Supports ILF operations including events, logistics, and recognition for recipients.

title: Cash & Gifts
description: We accept checks, cash, and in-kind gifts.
